title: Mobile Refinements
description: Mobile login, tab views, rich agent cards.

title: Mobile Login Full
description: Match design: Bio-Scan/Keycard options, server status footer, industrial decorative elements.

title: Mobile Tab Views
description: Agents tab (default), Flows tab, Queue tab, Logs tab per design specs.

title: Mobile Agent Cards Rich
description: Image hero section, task/uptime metadata, Inspect/Reboot buttons, error state styling.

title: UI Components
description: Command Palette, Connection Lost, Input, Button, StatusBadge, StatsCard components.

title: Command Palette
description: Cmd+K/Ctrl+K trigger, search autocomplete, agent spawn commands, formula triggers, quick nav, keyboard shortcuts. File: src/lib/components/CommandPalette.svelte

title: Connection Lost Screen
description: Warning icon animation, Connection Lost heading, reconnecting countdown, Retry Now button, offline mode indicator. File: src/lib/components/ConnectionLost.svelte

title: Input Component
description: Industrial style: icon prefix, corner accent decorations, password visibility toggle, focus transitions. File: src/lib/components/Input.svelte

title: Button Component
description: Variants: Primary, Secondary, Danger, Ghost. Icon button support, full width option. File: src/lib/components/Button.svelte

title: StatusBadge Variants
description: Add processing (spin), complete (checkmark), paused states. Enhance glow effects. File: src/lib/components/StatusBadge.svelte

title: Stats Card Component
description: Label + large number, fraction notation (14/20), accent color percentages. File: src/lib/components/StatsCard.svelte

title: Server Connection
description: Critical blocking epic: API Client, Data Sync, WebSocket, Real-time Events. Required for all real-time features.

title: API Client
description: HTTP client for REST endpoints. Bearer token auth, request/response type safety, error handling, retries, rate limiting. Files: src/lib/api/client.ts, src/lib/api/types.ts

title: Data Synchronization
description: Initial state fetch, incremental updates via WebSocket, conflict resolution, offline queue, sync status indicator. File: src/lib/stores/sync.svelte.ts

title: Real-time Event Handlers
description: Agent status, log stream, queue update, workflow progress handlers. Optimistic UI updates. File: src/lib/api/handlers.ts

title: WebSocket Client
description: Connect to ws://localhost:8080/ws. Reconnection with exponential backoff, heartbeat/ping-pong, connection state management, event dispatch to stores.

title: Authentication
description: Login page, auth token refresh, CSRF protection. Required for production.

title: Login Page SvelteKit
description: Industrial theme login: factory logo, Operator ID input, Security Key input with visibility toggle, corner accents, Initialize Session button, Bio-Scan/Keycard alt auth, server status indicator. File: src/routes/login/+page.svelte

title: Auth Token Refresh
description: Auto-refresh before expiration, handle refresh failures, redirect to login on auth failure.

title: CSRF Protection
description: CSRF token generation and validation on mutations.

title: Rate Limiting UI
description: Show rate limit feedback, Retry-After handling, exponential backoff display.

title: Performance
description: Lighthouse audit, bundle analysis, Core Web Vitals optimization.

title: Lighthouse Audit
description: Run Performance audit, fix critical issues, document baseline scores.

title: Bundle Analysis
description: Analyze chunk sizes, identify optimization opportunities, ensure < 200KB initial bundle.

title: Theming
description: Light theme implementation with CSS custom properties and theme toggle.

title: Light Theme
description: CSS custom properties for light mode, prefers-color-scheme support, theme toggle, localStorage persistence. Files: src/app.css, src/lib/stores/theme.svelte.ts

title: PWA Hardening
description: Install prompt, background sync queue, push notification UI.

title: PWA Install Prompt
description: Custom install banner, Add to Home Screen guidance, install status tracking.

title: Background Sync Queue
description: Queue mutations when offline, sync on reconnect, conflict resolution UI.

title: Push Notification UI
description: Permission request modal, notification preferences settings, test notification button.

title: Desktop Layouts
description: 3-column dashboard, agent detail split view, logs full view, queue table layout.

title: Desktop Dashboard 3-Column
description: Left: Agents panel grid. Center: Workflows + Queue. Right: System stats + Actions. Bottom: Full-width logs. File: src/routes/+page.svelte

title: Desktop Agent Detail Split
description: Left: Agent info + metrics. Right: Live terminal output. Actions bar: Stop, Restart, Reassign, Kill. File: src/routes/agents/[id]/+page.svelte

title: Desktop Logs Full View
description: Filter bar (Level, Source, Search), Pause/Play, scroll-to-bottom, table layout. File: src/routes/logs/+page.svelte

title: Desktop Queue Table
description: Stats sidebar, table (ID, Summary, Status, Agent), selection panel, actions (Reassign, Bump, Cancel). File: src/routes/queue/+page.svelte
